story_20_08000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Y-you gotta be kiddin’ me...
How did we lose?
story_20_08000/2401_1001_0200_10: Woo-hoo! We beat these thieves to smithereens!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_0500_10: Guess we managed to do it in the end!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Which means it’s time for you Team Break crooks
to hand over the Pokémon you stole!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_0700_10: Heh heh... No can do, girlie!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_0800_10: Don’t tell me you still haven’t learned your lesson!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Uhh, do we look like we’re good at learnin’
lessons? Hah! We’re not gonna stop till we’ve
totally annihilated this tournament!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_1000_10:
And you kiddies walked right into our trap!
When I give the signal, you’ll be surrounded by
every Team Break member in this hideout!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Bwahaha!
It’s game over for you now!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Huh? Where is everybody?!
If they’re playin’ hooky...
story_20_08000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Sorry, but your colleagues have already
been apprehended.
story_20_08000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Long time no see. Thanks to your distraction,
I was able to complete our objective.
story_20_08000/2401_1001_1800_10:
N-no way... This place was crawlin’ with
Team Break members and Pokémon!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_1900_10: You tellin’ me you took out ALL of ’em?!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_2000_10:
That’s correct. My being here should be
proof of that.
story_20_08000/2401_1001_2100_10:
So, you now have a choice to make—
come quietly, or...
story_20_08000/2401_1001_2200_10:
see how you fare in a battle against
Garchomp and me! Take your pick.
story_20_08000/2401_1001_2400_10: W-we’re sorry we stole the Pokémon!
story_20_08000/2401_1001_2500_10: There, that wasn’t so hard, was it?
